Class Answer

java.lang.Object
models.Answer
public class Answer extends Object
Represents an answer in a Q and A system Contains information about the answer content, author, and associated question

  • Constructor Details

    • Answer

      public Answer(String content, String author)
      Creates a new Answer with the given content and author
      Parameters:
      content - The text of the answer
      author - The name of the person writing the answer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if content is null or empty
